txt.en: 'I am very glad to have your assistance in this matter, [placeholder].\n\n'Part of our bait will require a fair number of hides to act as the skin of our fake \qfish.\q  Bring me twenty boiled extraordinary leathers and I'll add them to our collection.'
'Well done, [placeholder]! Your contribution is greatly appreciated.\n\n'Be sure to speak with me again if you have more ingredients to add to the pile.'
'Have you gathered the materials I requested, [placeholder]?'
Hasta is asking that anyone willing to help him should gather the various ingredients necessary to draw forth the menace from beneath the Water-works.
Boiled extraordinary leathers can be processed by the foresters of Middle-earth.\n\nHasta would like you to bring him twenty boiled extraordinary leathers.
Bring Boiled Extraordinary Leather to Hasta ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
